description: An ancient city located in the Thracian plain, Augusta Traiana was a Roman foundation that superseded the Hellenistic city of Beroe. Now present-day Stara Zagora, Bulgaria.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Stara Zagora BUL
